column3: Byang phyogs bstan ‘gro’i skyabs mgon Thams-cad-mkhyen-pa Khal-kha Er-te-ne Khu-thag-thu Blo-bzang-bstan-‘dzin-rgyal-mtshan gyi’i gsung ʼbum
Rje-btsun-dam-pa sku phreng brgyad paʼi gsung ʼbum
Rje-btsun Thams-cad-mkhyen-pa Dge-ʼdun-rgya-mtshoʼi gsung ʼbum bzhugs so
Sgrub thabs ʼdod ʼjoʼi bum bzang gi brgyud paʼi rim pa phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa bzhugs so
Bkaʼ gdams kyi skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi gsung bgros thor bu rnams bzhugs so
